intro.subtitle: E-LIQUID CALCULATOR
intro.warning_title: Focus on following safety guidelines when mixing
intro.warning_text: When mixing e-liquid, always wear protective gloves and work in a well-ventilated area, especially when using nicotine boosters. Use only quality ingredients without additives and with food-grade certification suitable for vaping from verified suppliers. Follow exact ingredient ratios. Store finished liquid out of reach of children and pets.
intro.prep_pg_detail: Propylene glycol is a colorless, odorless liquid that forms the base of e-liquids. It provides flavor transfer and creates the characteristic "throat hit" sensation. It is hygroscopic, so store it in a closed container. PG is generally considered safe for inhalation and is also used in food and pharmaceuticals.
intro.prep_vg_detail: Vegetable glycerin is a thick, sweet liquid derived from vegetable oils. It is responsible for producing thick vapor and adds a gentle sweetness to the liquid. The higher the VG ratio, the thicker the vapor, but less pronounced flavor. VG is suitable for direct lung (DL) vaping and high-power devices.
intro.prep_flavors_detail: E-liquid flavors are concentrated aromas specifically designed for vaping. Use only flavors intended for e-liquids, not food flavorings! Concentration typically ranges between 5-20% depending on the flavor type. Fruit flavors are more intense, while dessert and tobacco flavors require higher percentages and longer steeping.
intro.prep_nicotine_detail:
Nicotine Booster: Traditional form of nicotine with a more pronounced throat hit. Suitable for regular vaping.

Nicotine Salt: A gentler form of nicotine that absorbs faster and has a weaker throat hit even at higher concentrations. Suitable for pod systems and MTL devices. WARNING: Nicotine is a poison! Always wear gloves and work in a well-ventilated area.
intro.prep_gloves_detail: Nitrile or latex gloves are essential when working with nicotine. Nicotine is easily absorbed through the skin and can cause poisoning. Gloves also protect against contamination of the mixture and maintain sterility. Use disposable gloves and dispose of them safely after work. If skin is splashed with nicotine, wash thoroughly with soap and water.
intro.prep_bottle_detail: Glass bottles are ideal for storing e-liquids as they don't react with the contents and don't affect taste. Dark glass (amber) protects from UV radiation and extends shelf life. Bottles with droppers or narrow necks are suitable for mixing. Always thoroughly clean and dry bottles before use.
intro.prep_dropper_detail: Measuring tools are essential for precise dosing of ingredients. Dropper: Suitable for smaller volumes, less precise. Pipette: More accurate than dropper, suitable for medium volumes. Syringe (without needle): Most accurate option, ideal for nicotine. Use separate tools for each ingredient to avoid contamination.
intro.prep_measuring_detail: For accurate mixing, you need reliable measuring tools. Graduated cylinders: For measuring volume in ml. Measuring syringes: Various sizes for different ingredients (1ml for nicotine, 5-10ml for VG/PG). Always measure twice and mix once!
intro.app_description: Calculator for safe e-liquid mixing with precise PG/VG ratio, flavor, and nicotine calculations. Don't start from scratch every time â€” save your favorite recipes and products or share them with friends. Also works as an offline app in 31 languages.
intro.disclaimer_text: By clicking the "Start Mixing" button, the user confirms being at least 18 years of age. The user acknowledges that LiquiMixer serves solely as a calculation tool (calculator) and assumes no responsibility for the final product. The user bears full responsibility for proper mixing, handling of ingredients, and compliance with safety procedures.

additive.coolant_desc: Adds cooling effect without menthol flavor. WS-23 is smoothest, Koolada is stronger.
additive.sweetener_desc: Adds sweetness without calories. May gunk coils at higher percentages.
additive.enhancer_desc: Smooth reduces throat irritation, Throat Hit increases it.
additive.terpene_desc: Natural aromatic compounds. Use carefully, they are very concentrated.

shortfill.info: Shortfill is a bottle with nicotine-free e-liquid that has empty space for adding nicotine shots.

ratio_descriptions.vg_0_9: Maximum vapor, no flavor or throat hit. Designed for high-power devices >80W, otherwise the coil clogs.
ratio_descriptions.vg_10_29: Maximum vapor, minimal flavor without throat hit. Thick liquid for cloud vaping. Designed for high-power devices >80W, otherwise the coil clogs.
ratio_descriptions.vg_30_34: Strong vapor, weakening or spoiled flavor. Still thick liquid.
ratio_descriptions.vg_35_40: Noticeable vapor increase, flavor remains present. Balanced liquid with emphasis on vapor.
ratio_descriptions.vg_41_55: Balanced ratio of vapor and flavor, suitable for most devices.
ratio_descriptions.vg_56_60: Gentle throat hit, present flavor, weaker vapor. Suitable for MTL devices.
ratio_descriptions.vg_61_70: More pronounced throat hit, strong flavor. For experienced vapers.
ratio_descriptions.vg_71_90: Throat irritation and scratching for dry air, strong flavor. Only for special DTL devices with higher coil resistance.
ratio_descriptions.vg_91_100: Throat irritation and scratching for dry air, maximum flavor and nicotine. No vapor. Only for special DTL devices with higher resistance.

ratio_warning.limited_to: Ratio limited to {min}â€“{max}% VG due to: {reasons}.
ratio_warning.limited_nicotine: Ratio limited to {min}â€“{max}% VG due to nicotine base ratio.

nicotine_descriptions.nic_0: No nicotine - suitable for non-smokers or gradual cessation.
nicotine_descriptions.nic_1_3: Very light nicotine - for occasional vapers and final cessation stages.
nicotine_descriptions.nic_4_6: Light nicotine - for light smokers (up to 10 cigarettes per day).
nicotine_descriptions.nic_7_11: Medium nicotine - for moderate smokers (10-20 cigarettes per day).
nicotine_descriptions.nic_12_20: For heavy smokers, strong cigarettes, nausea may occur without prior experience.
nicotine_descriptions.nic_21_35: High nicotine - only for very heavy smokers or pod systems. Nicotine salt recommended.
nicotine_descriptions.nic_36_45: Extremely strong - only for pod systems with nicotine salt. Risk of overdose!

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.section1_text: These Terms and Conditions govern the rights and obligations of the parties when providing the LiquiMixer service, operated by WOOs, s. r. o., Company ID: 05117810, VAT ID: CZ05117810, registered office at Brloh 12, 397 01 Drhovle, Czech Republic.
terms.section2_text: The subject of the contract is the provision of access to the LiquiMixer online application for e-liquid recipe calculations for a period of 365 days from the subscription activation date.
terms.section3_text: The subscription price includes VAT. Payment is a one-time charge for 365 days processed through the GP webpay payment gateway. An invoice is automatically issued and sent to your email after successful payment.
terms.section4_text: Due to the nature of digital content and immediate service activation, the consumer agrees that they waive the right to withdraw from the contract. After payment, the user waives the right to a refund for the subscription, as the administrative costs of refunding are higher than the subscription payment itself.
terms.section5_text: In case of technical issues with the service, please contact support via the contact form. Complaints will be resolved within 30 days.
terms.section6_text: Personal data processing is governed by GDPR. Data is processed only for service provision purposes and is not shared with third parties except for the payment gateway.
terms.section7_text: By using the LiquiMixer application, the user confirms that they are at least 18 years of age. The user acknowledges that LiquiMixer serves solely as a calculation tool (calculator) and assumes no responsibility for the final product. The user bears full responsibility for proper mixing, handling of ingredients, and compliance with safety procedures.
terms.section8_text: This website does not sell vaping devices, e-liquids, or any other vaping-related products. The operator does not promote vaping or smoking. Vaping and the use of nicotine products are harmful to health. The LiquiMixer application functions solely as a calculator for recipe calculations and assumes no responsibility for the use of these calculations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_contact: Contact: via the contact form in the app (Menu â†’ Contact)
privacy.section2_intro: As part of providing the LiquiMixer service, we process the following personal data:
privacy.section2_list2: Payment data: transaction details (processed by GP WebPay payment gateway)
privacy.section2_list3: User data: saved recipes, products, app settings
privacy.section2_list4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, language
privacy.section3_intro: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.section3_list1: Providing the LiquiMixer service and managing your user account
privacy.section3_list3: Sending important information about the service (changes to terms, technical notices)
privacy.section3_list4: Improving the service and user experience
privacy.section4_intro: We process personal data based on:
privacy.section4_list1: Contract performance - providing the LiquiMixer service
privacy.section4_list2: Legal obligation - accounting and tax regulations
privacy.section5_list1: User account: for the duration of the account + 3 months after deletion
privacy.section5_list2: Invoices and payment data: 10 years (legal requirement)
privacy.section5_list3: Saved recipes: for the duration of the account
privacy.section6_intro: We share your data only with:
privacy.section6_list2: Clerk - authentication and user account management
privacy.section6_outro: All these providers comply with GDPR requirements.
privacy.section7_intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.section7_list1: Right of access - obtain information about processed data
privacy.section7_list2: Right to rectification - correct inaccurate data
privacy.section7_list3: Right to erasure - request deletion of your data
privacy.section7_list4: Right to restriction of processing - limit how data is processed
privacy.section7_list5: Right to data portability - obtain data in machine-readable format
privacy.section7_list6: Right to lodge a complaint - with the Data Protection Authority
privacy.section7_how_text: To exercise any right, contact us via the contact form in the app (Menu â†’ Contact â†’ GDPR / Data Deletion).
privacy.section8_intro: You can delete your account and all associated data by contacting support via the contact form with a deletion request (Menu â†’ Contact â†’ GDPR / Data Deletion).
privacy.section8_outro: After account deletion, your data will be removed within 30 days, except for data we are legally required to retain (invoices).
privacy.section9_intro: The LiquiMixer app uses only essential technical cookies for:
privacy.section9_outro: We do not use analytics or advertising cookies.
privacy.section10_list2: Encryption of sensitive data in the database
privacy.section10_list4: Access to data limited to authorized personnel only
privacy.section11_intro: For questions about personal data protection, contact us:
privacy.section11_contact: Contact form: Menu â†’ Contact â†’ GDPR / Data Deletion
